title: Energy for the future
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Examines energy alternatives for the future, including processed coal, shale oil, geothermal heat, nuclear fission and fusion, wind and solar heat. Many of these sources already supply part of our country’s energy needs - but some with accompanying social and environmental consequences
